title: A Life Of Peace Wellness Institute Online Classes
description: A Life Of Peace Wellness Institute of online classes and certifications.
text:
Clases en línea
Cada temporada, A Life Of Peace Wellness Education Institute ofrece una amplia variedad de clases para el desarrollo de su bienestar personal y profesional. Nuestras certificaciones y clases exclusivas están diseñadas para satisfacer las necesidades de los estudiantes que desean un entorno de aprendizaje flexible, un flujo a su propio ritmo o simplemente no pueden llegar a nuestras ubicaciones físicas. Nuestros instructores en línea tienen más de treinta años de experiencia en capacitación integral en salud y bienestar y brindan la plataforma de aprendizaje virtual que incluye series de conferencias, visuales amigables para el alumno, manuales personalizados, tareas prácticas independientes y varias opciones de estudio para el aprendizaje completo en el aula. Nunca probé una clase en línea, está bien, nuestro aula en línea es muy fácil de usar y las grabaciones están disponibles en caso de que necesite revisar. Para la experiencia de aprendizaje en línea que ayuda a sanar,
Below are the ALOP certifications available on Teach.able
Selecciones de clases en línea
[Certificación en línea de consultor de salud y bienestar natural](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/naturopath-certification?lang=es)
[Certificación en línea de salud y bienestar natural a su propio ritmo](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/nhwc-self-paced-course?lang=es)
[Capacitación en línea para terapeutas de desintoxicación](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/detox-certification?lang=es)
[Entrenamiento en línea de Iridología naturopática](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/iridology-certification?lang=es)
[Entrenamiento holístico en línea de Doula](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/doula-certification?lang=es)
[Ritos de iniciación en línea del Templo de la Diosa Sagrada](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/rites-of-passage?lang=es)
[Sesiones grupales en línea de herborista naturista](https://www.alifeofpeace.org/herbalist-certification?lang=es)
Detox Therapist
Certification
This certification prepares the student to service the whole needs of the client in all aspects of living. Detoxification for many has to be a lifestyle change and not just quick fix. Therefore, students are taught to approach the detox process from a naturopathic perspective, with full focus on not only the physical, but the emotional, mental and spiritual need for cleansing and rejuvenation.
Maternity Reiki Certification
Pregnancy is one of life's most beautiful and spiritual experience and a unique experience - with it comes transitions, changes, and challenges to the physical body. Earn a certification that helps pregnant women manage the changes in their bodies, all while keeping them connected to their babies.
Naturopathic Iridology Certification
Iridology is a holistic health assessment tool used for reading the physical characteristics of the iris as a means of bringing attention to possible ailments, inherent weaknesses, and health concerns. Iridology, now a credible wellness genre is used internationally by thousands of naturopaths and natural health professionals. The study of Iridology Iridology equips the serious health care provider with the tools to assist clients in bringing balance to their mental, physical and emotional functions.
Naturopathic Reiki Certification
Naturopathic Reiki is a complete form of energy medicine that is taught with the focus of helping the physical, mental, emotional and spiritual regeneration of both the therapist and the receiving client. Reiki restores synergy and helps a wide range of ailments and stresses. Learn Naturopathic Reiki to calm the mind, expand inner awareness, enhance transformation, and promote positive growth. It harmonizes and optimizes the body/mind processes by unlocking creativity, accelerating spiritual growth, and it encourages positive change in life.
Crystal Therapy Certification
Crystal Therapy can be used in the healing processes of the body, mind, emotions and spirit. If you are seeking balance in your health or would like to learn a skill to enrich your current wellness service, we have an easy learning course that indulges the senses sight, sound, taste, touch, smell and spiritual vibrations that are a memorable influence for the novice and the professional. Learn to develop Crystal Therapy Programs that compliment every aspect of health.
Natural Health And Wellness Consultant Certification
Earn certification as a Natural Health and Wellness Consultant. This certification can be used for personal, family, and community service. It can also be used in professional health services as a traditional naturopath, nutritional consultant, and holistic health consultant.
Teach.able House Rules
The House Rules were created to make it as simple as possible for our users to understand their rights and responsibilities when using the Teachable platform. As your privacy and security is our priority, We encourage you to read each document in full:
[Terms of Use:](https://click.hello.teachable.com/?qs=e4602741577a5b2b518eec94c4221eb96fbca4ae9d2935a0467a8c55ce7a2b4b583443337736d3d5a32abb29720f0012a88679f0641bdf4b) Give details about different types of accounts that you may create on the platform, as well as clarified who owns what on the platform. [Privacy Policy:](https://click.hello.teachable.com/?qs=e4602741577a5b2b6d1cb10c18f46d609a475e2f410b150b262a1a9398b3bbcd7ee7d1adc29143eef45f82af336d219be2ee63714be63823) Provides more clarity around the types of data collected. [House Rules:](https://click.hello.teachable.com/?qs=e4602741577a5b2bc288967a20d2c0c335c18c760471b4849d13e53f6a4a69ad6c96ad785c2b633a54d0ddaf7e06c55e6c70122d80d518b2) New terms that provide guidance around who’s responsible for what on the platform.
